headline: A Look At Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) Valuation After Its Recent 24% Three Month Share Price Gain
summary: Why Cognizant Technology Solutions Stock Is On Investors’ Radar Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) has attracted attention after a strong past 3 months, with a return of about 24%, contrasting with a modest month-long decline and a small pullback in the past week. See our latest analysis for Cognizant Technology Solutions. headline: Cognizant price target raised to $98 from $90 at Susquehanna
summary: Susquehanna analyst James Friedman raised the firm’s price target on Cognizant (CTSH) to $98 from $90 and keeps a Positive rating on the shares. The firm said CEO Ravi Kumar has been successfully piloting the companywith his “3 Vectors Strategy” and the firm’s nulerous industry checks over the quarter suggests broad-based growth durability, tempered by exposure to smaller, discretionary deals.
